function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and overcrowding in buildings can increase the risk of contagious disease transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among occupants","Mitigation":"Improve ventilation systems, reduce occupancy levels, and implement social distancing measures","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, occupancy monitoring systems, and ventilation control systems","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building administrators"},{"Description":"Inadequate implementation of social distancing measures in architectural design","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission due to close proximity of individuals","Mitigation":"Incorporate spatial planning to maintain distance, utilize barriers and partitions, and optimize building layout for distance","Technologies":"Digital layout planning tools, barrier materials, and spatial analysis software","People":"Architects, urban planners, and building designers","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, and building designers"}]}
